roles.title: üì± Digital Strategist
roles.description: Develops the high-level plan for all social campaigns, platform usage, and brand identity.
responsibilities: Define target audience and key messaging.
Monitor industry trends and competitive analysis.
Ensure all posts align with the Plexus brand guide.

roles.title: üì∏ Content Producer
roles.description: The creative force behind visual and video media, from shooting to final editing.
responsibilities: Capture high-resolution images and videos of events.
Edit and apply club branding to all visual assets.
Manage media file organization and storage.

roles.title: ‚úçÔ∏è Copywriter & Community Manager
roles.description: Crafts engaging post captions and actively manages comments and direct messages.
responsibilities: Write clear, catchy, and error-free copy for all social platforms.
Respond to community inquiries and foster online dialogue.

roles.title: üìä Analytics Specialist
roles.description: Measures the effectiveness of all digital efforts and provides actionable performance reports.
responsibilities: Track key performance indicators (KPIs) like reach and impressions.
Provide weekly and monthly performance reports to club heads.
Identify opportunities for growth through data analysis.
